fields.value: Risk Aversion and Determinants of Stock Market Behavior Data

dsDescriptionValue.value: These data and/or computer programs are part of ICPSR's   Publication-Related Archive and are distributed exactly as they arrived   from the data depositor. ICPSR has not checked or processed this   material. Users should consult the INVESTIGATOR(S) if further  information is desired.

fields.value: Version Date: 1996-01-03Version Text: 1996-01-03Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The data files are in MicroTSP format and appear as two   MicroTSP work files. All of the annual data series are in the work   file, STOCKA, and all of the monthly data series are in the work file,   STOCKM. For someone using MicroTSP, the easiest way to access the data   is through these work files. The series are also included individually   as MicroTSP "DB" files. These are basically ASCII files and can be  read directly without MicroTSP.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Electronic documentation.;
